Just a question. Recently I hit my air ticket and hotel charges to UOB prvi. Do I need a UOB KF for payment of air ticket and hotel charges? And based on my this year expenses  there is less than $2000 will charge to UOB KF yearly. Can I ask for waiver of AF alsoÔºüüòÇ

UOB KF is my SQ  Scoot and public transport card. I like it for scoot for its additional benefits like board me first  free seat selection and/or additional checked in luggage. if you dont take scoot/sq often  i dont see a point.
This is also the reason why I choose UOB prvi instead
Btw  UOB KF is also a good card to have for large expense via Kris+. But that is case by case.
But based on my recently monthly spending. UOB one cc and CRMC+ Amaze can cover most of my daily expenses. Just don‚Äôt have a card for get miles on travelling.
